content:
• Electronic Magazines delivered to your personal device
  • Blazing fast Autobahn Wi-Fi throughout the hotel – unlimited device connections
  • Free printing and faxing
  • Use of public area iMac Computers & iPads
  • *Use of Stanford Court device library – available for loan: Macbook, Chromebook,Ipod, Ipad, Jambox, GoPro
  • Local & long distance calls
  • Locally roasted organic & free-trade Equator morning coffee, Mighty-Leaf teas and fresh juices
  • Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf in your guestroom 
  • Water bottles & filling stations throughout the hotel
  • Kids under 6 eat breakfast for free when accompanied by parent
  • Day use of our fleet of local Marin and Specialized bicycles*
  • Use of our Yoga mats for free local Yoga sessions*
  • Use of our umbrellas on rainy days*
  • A first-class fitness center experience complete with Energizing Tunes, Cool Towels & Fresh Fruit
  • Custom walking, jogging and bike maps
  • A curated, high-tech walking tour of Nob Hill & Chinatown
  • *limited supply available
